name: unnerve

effect.sun_moon: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
